page.title: 08** BIRTHDAY TREAT **
page.content:
{Birthday Treat 1985}
On my birthday I went to Sewerby near Bridlington. I saw a white owl, eight parrots and three budgies. We had a packed lunch. I had go on the swings, had my photo taken and went to the beach. My relatives were there and they sang 'Happy Birthday' to me. I got in my costume. My dad was sunbathing and I buried him in the sand. He chased after me and my brother joined in the fun. I got dressed and my dad said that it was time to go home on the train. When we got home my Dad sneaked in to get a surprise party ready for me. I had a great time. I call that a SPECIAL birthday treat. { {By Kelly Wilson. Aged 9. {St. Gregory's Primary School.
